Uses of Interface
org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpClientRequest

  • Packages that use HttpClientRequest 
    Package Description
    org.vertx.java.core.http  

    • Uses of HttpClientRequest in org.vertx.java.core.http

      Methods in org.vertx.java.core.http that return HttpClientRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.connect(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP CONNECT request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.delete(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP DELETE request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.get(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP GET request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.head(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP HEAD request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.options(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP OPTIONS request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.patch(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP PATCH request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.post(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP POST request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.put(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP PUT request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.putHeader(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Put an HTTP header - fluent API
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.request(java.lang.String method, java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.sendHead()
      Forces the head of the request to be written before end() is called on the request or any data is written to it.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.setChunked(boolean chunked)
      If chunked is true then the request will be set into HTTP chunked mode
      HttpClientRequest HttpClient.trace(java.lang.String uri, Handler<HttpClientResponse> responseHandler)
      This method returns an HttpClientRequest instance which represents an HTTP TRACE request with the specified uri.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.write(Buffer chunk)
      Write a Buffer to the request body.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.write(Buffer chunk, Handler<java.lang.Void> doneHandler)
      Write a Buffer to the request body.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.write(java.lang.String chunk)
      Write a String to the request body, encoded in UTF-8.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.write(java.lang.String chunk, Handler<java.lang.Void> doneHandler)
      Write a String to the request body, encoded in UTF-8.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.write(java.lang.String chunk, java.lang.String enc)
      Write a String to the request body, encoded using the encoding enc.
      HttpClientRequest HttpClientRequest.write(java.lang.String chunk, java.lang.String enc, Handler<java.lang.Void> doneHandler)
      Write a String to the request body, encoded with encoding enc.
